item.title: Crouton Explained on an HP Chromebook 11
item.description: In episode 1721 of hak5 host Darren explains what Crouton is, what chrooted environment means and how you can run Linux on a Chromebook.

item.title: How to Install Ubuntu on a Acer C710 Chromebooks Running Coreboot
item.description: In this tutorial YouTuber Johnny Phung shows how to install Ubuntu Linux on an Acer C710 Chromebook with Coreboot flashed on it.

item.title: Migrate an old Hacktop from Windows XP to Ubuntu
item.description: These videos from the Computerphile channel show how to migrate an 8yr old Hacktop from Windows XP to Ubuntu 2012 LTS.

item.title: How to Run Linux on Chromebooks with Crouton
item.description: In this video tutorial YouTuber Johnny Phung shows how you can run other Linuxes than Chrome OS on Chromebooks using a software called crouton.

item.title: Chrome OS Introduced on a Samsung Series 5 550 Chromebook
item.description: A nice introductory video to Chrome OS from TechHarvest on YouTube, especially for people unfamiliar but interested in Google's operating system.

item.title: Replacing the WiFi Card in an MSI Wind U100 Netbook
item.description: This is a video for the tinkerers among you, which shows how to upgrade the built-in Realtek WiFi card of an MSI Wind U100 netbook to an draft N card,

item.title: How to Wipe out Windows 7 and install BackTrack on a Netbook
item.description: This is a fun video showing how to completely wipe out Windows 7 Starter from a netbook using the Katana security suite and how to install BackTrack Linux on it.

item.title: Installing Ubuntu Netbook Remix on ASUS Eee PC 1001HA
item.description: Here is another tutorial style video from the OSGUI Tech Show showing the installation of Ubuntu Netbook Remix 9.10 on an ASUS Eee PC 1001HA netbook from a USB

item.title: How to Install Ubuntu Netbook Remix 9.10 Screencast
item.description: This screencast tutorial from the OSGUI Tech Show shows how to install Ubuntu Netbook Remix 9.10. Tim takes you through the installation steps and after

item.title: Beginner Intro to Ubuntu Netbook Remix
item.description: If you are new to Ubuntu Netbook Remix this video will give you a basic overview and a few customization tips to get started with version 9.10 of this popular
